message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $200. It's a great deal! Let me know what you think.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to come down to $175. This is still a good price considering the value of the product.  What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $175, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product.
Bob, I understand you're working within a budget.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $145. Let's make this deal happen!
I appreciate you meeting me halfway at $145, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $135 for the product.
